# HashSeq

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of HashSeq is to infer true biological 16 rRNA sequences from background error.

## Installation

You can install the released version of HashSeq from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("HashSeq")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("FarnazFouladi/HashSeq")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(HashSeq)
## basic example code
```
